page.title: 19LIFE-STYLES
page.content:
{ TOWN LIFE} WHERE I LIVE THERE IS LOTS OF SPACE TO PLAY OUT BECAUSE NOT MUCH TRAFFIC COMES DOWN OUR ROAD. IN MY SPARE TIME I GO DOWN THE PARK AND BEACH WHICH ARE NOT VERY FAR AWAY. WHEN I HAVE TO RUN ERRANDS IT IS NOT VERY FAR AWAY TO THE SHOPS BUT THE TOWN IS. SCHOOL IS CLOSE AND SOMETIMES WE GO IN THE CAR. I ALSO GO DOWN TO MY ALLOTMENT WHICH IS NEARBY. THE RAILWAY STATION IS ONLY AT THE BOTTOM OF MY ROAD.
I PLAY WITH MY FRIEND JAMES AND WITH MY RABBIT AND A TORTOISE. I LIVE IN LINDEN AVENUE AND WE GO TO SCHOOL BETWEEN 8.45 A.M AND 3.OO P.M. WHICH IS QUITE A LONG TIME.
SOMETIMES I GO OVER TO THE GOLF LINKS WITH MY MUM, DAD AND SISTER.
